SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Main class of the Similar Fashion Finder application, responsible for orchestrating the whole process.
CorsFilter
This class configures the CORS filter for the API.
DatasetBaseProduct
Interface for dataset products that are used in the image matching process.
DatasetDeserializer
Class for deserializing JSON files with products from the Zoot and Zalando datasets.
ImageFileManager
Class for downloading and deleting image files.
ImageMatcherDbManager
This class manages the connection to the H2 database with image hashing algorithms.
ImageSearchApi
This class represents the API for searching similar products based on the image URL.
ImagesRetrieval
Class for retrieving images from the database and matching them with the provided image.
ImagesUploader
Class for downloading and uploading images to the H2 database.
ImageTransformation
Class for transforming images to a square dimension and resizing them.
ProductMatch
Represents a product match found by the image matching algorithm.
ProductsDbManager
Manages the connection to the MongoDB database with products.
ProductsRetrieval
Class for fetching products from the MongoDB collections "zoot-products" and "zalando-products".
ProductsUploader
Class for uploading products from the Zoot and Zalando datasets to the MongoDB collections.
SwaggerConfiguration
This class configures the Swagger UI for the API documentation.
ZalandoProduct
Represents a product extracted from Zalando website.

ZalandoProduct.Size
 
ZootProduct
Represents a product extracted from Zoot website.
ZootProduct.Attribute
 
ZootProduct.Brand
 
ZootProduct.Breadcrumb
 
ZootProduct.Price
 
ZootProduct.Size
